entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Moosonee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:09 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -5.4°C

Observed at: Moosonee Airport 10:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
